keyword: how many calories are in a twinkie
title: How Many Calories Are in a Twinkie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a twinkie, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and other nutrition facts based on a standard Hostess serving.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Twinkie?
assumptions: Standard Hostess Twinkie (about 38 g), golden sponge cake with cream filling; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe changes, and expiration; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A single Twinkie has about 150 calories, mostly from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use low-sugar or diet version (if available)
Homemade with less sugar in filling

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Twinkie?
What are the carbs in a Twinkie?
faqs.a: About 27 g total carbs, including 19 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Twinkie high in fat?
faqs.a: It has 5 g total fat, with 2.5 g saturated fat; moderate for a snack.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Twinkie?
faqs.a: Only about 1 g protein per Twinkie.
Typically 0 mg cholesterol, as it's egg-free in modern recipes.
